name: drawbot
description: This moves the mouse to draw stuff

scripts.build: echo Compiling node && pkg index.js -r ./classes/**/* -o ./dist/drawbot.exe --verbose && echo Compiling python && pyinstaller --onefile gui.py && pyinstaller --onefile initializePositions.py && echo Done! cleaning up... && del /s gui.spec initializePositions.spec && rmdir /s /q build && echo Done! executables are in dist/

author: 1euro7cent
